categories.name: Performance
categories.description: These encapsulate your web app's current performance and opportunities to improve it.

categories.name: Progressive Web App
categories.description: These checks validate the aspects of a Progressive Web App, as specified by the baseline [PWA Checklist](https://developers.google.com/web/progressive-web-apps/checklist).

categories.name: Accessibility
categories.description: These checks highlight opportunities to [improve the accessibility of your web app](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/accessibility). Only a subset of accessibility issues can be automatically detected so manual testing is also encouraged.

categories.name: Best Practices
categories.description: We've compiled some recommendations for modernizing your web app and avoiding performance pitfalls.

categories.name: SEO
categories.description: These checks ensure that your page is optimized for search engine results ranking. There are additional factors Lighthouse does not check that may affect your search ranking. [Learn more](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/35769).
